subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, the Rangers won their fourth elimination game of the playoffs, and they will now play a Game 7 on Friday night at Madison Square Garden, where the franchise is 7-0 in such games.
snippet: On Tuesday, the Rangers won their fourth elimination game of the playoffs, and they will now play a Game 7 on Friday night at Madison Square Garden, where the franchise is 7-0 in such games.
